subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets certainly were not acting like a team that had lost consecutive series for the first time this season, had won only two of six on this road trip, and had seen their lead in the National League East reduced to one game.
snippet: The Mets certainly were not acting like a team that had lost consecutive series for the first time this season, had won only two of six on this road trip, and had seen their lead in the National League East reduced to one game.
